Interface EditorAuthorizationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    • Method Detail

      • allowedToModifyNamespace

        boolean allowedToModifyNamespace(Principal user,
                                 String ns)
        Checks whether a given user is allowed to modify machine tags belonging to the given namespace.
        Parameters:
        user - the security context user principal
        ns - the namespace in question
        Returns:
        true if the user is allowed to modify the namespace

      • allowedToDeleteMachineTag

        boolean allowedToDeleteMachineTag(Principal user,
                                  int machineTagKey)
        Returns:
        true if rights exist for this user to delete the tag

      • allowedToModifyEntity

        boolean allowedToModifyEntity(Principal user,
                              UUID key)
        Checks whether a given registry entity is explicitly part of the list of entities for an editor user.
        Parameters:
        user - the security context user principal
        key - the entity in question
        Returns:
        true if the passed entity is allowed to be modified

      • allowedToModifyDataset

        boolean allowedToModifyDataset(Principal user,
                               UUID datasetKey)

      • allowedToModifyOrganization

        boolean allowedToModifyOrganization(Principal user,
                                    UUID orgKey)

      • allowedToModifyInstallation

        boolean allowedToModifyInstallation(Principal user,
                                    UUID installationKey)
